text: Heroes is an American television show on the network NBC in the US, BBC 2 in the UK and various other stations worldwide. It is about a group of people who have superpowers. It was shown from 2006-2010. ==Main characters== * Peter Petrelli * Emma Coolidge * Claire Bennet * Sylar * Samuel Sullivan * Hiro and Ando == Other websites == * Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:2010 American television series endings Category:2000s American drama television series Category:2000s science fiction television series Category:2010s American drama television series Category:2010s science fiction television series Category:American science fiction television series Category:American time travel television series Category:NBC network series Category:English-language television programs
title: Heroes (TV series)
